semantic_identifier: [GOLD-198]: Implement status normalization service using canonical status mapping (ingest + outbound payloads)
title: Implement status normalization service using canonical status mapping (ingest + outbound payloads)

sections.text: Create a shared status-normalization module that translates external statuses (Zendesk/Intercom, Jira/Linear, CRM) to the canonical Issue_Tracker status using the mapping table from GOLD-197. Apply this module in the ingestion/update pipelines so all stored issue objects persist only canonical status + original external status metadata. Gracefully handle unknown/deprecated external statuses by assigning an explicit fallback canonical status and emitting structured logs for later cleanup.
